text: Katie G. Hannon is an Irish journalist and TV presenter. Katie was educated in Our Lady of Fatima, School in Listowel, Co. Kerry, she studied Journalism in the Dublin Institute of Technology in Rathmines and Aungier Street. ==Career== Hannon's media involvement includes: *Evening Herald (1992–99) *Irish Examiner (1999–2001) *Ireland on Sunday (2002–04) *RTÉ (2004–present)https://ie.linkedin.com/in/katiehannon Hannon appeared on a 2004 episode of The Panel. ==Bibliography== *The Naked Politician (2004) ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Irish investigative journalists Category:RTÉ newsreaders and journalists
title: Katie Hannon
